title: Intellectual property runs amok
author: VD
content_html: Since I’m a writer, you’d think I’d be a great champion of intellectual property, but corporations such as Disney have bribed Congress into stretching the concept beyond all reasonable interpretation. I suppose we can expect to see more of this sort of thing as information continues to become simultaneously more valuable and easier to access.
content_text:
Since I’m a writer, you’d think I’d be a great champion of intellectual property, but corporations such as Disney have bribed Congress into stretching the concept beyond all reasonable interpretation.  I suppose we can expect to see more of
this sort of thing
as information continues to become simultaneously more valuable and easier to access.
